ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We have iman in the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And said: "We (affirm and) believe in the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: saying: "We (now) believe in the Lord of the Universe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: saying, "We believe in the Lord of the Universe
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We have accepted faith in the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of Al-`Alamin."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We believe in the Lord of the worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We believe in the Lord of all Being,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Crying: We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: saying, "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we believe in the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We believe in the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: saying: 'We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We have believed in the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:47] They said, ‘We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Crying: We believe in the Lord of the Worlds) upon which Pharaoh said: are you referring to me?
